title: Good champion with ability to absorb damage.
body:
Hey!

I'm quite new to the game. I usually play with Talon, and his ability to absorb damage is really low, making it easy for me to get killed. Is there any good champion who can absorb damage, at the same time deal damage.
If you have any other suggestions, you're welcome.

Thanks.

{{champion:82}} Mordekaiser does just that. His passive gives him a shield for doing damage. His damage is insanely high, and he drains a shitton of HP from enemies. Problem is he's been nerfed into oblivion and left weak on purpose until his kit is reworked. 

You can try him at least, I think he's like 1000 ip at this point. I've mained him since I started the game a few years back. He's not totally useless and can work since no one knows what he does. Plus, getting the enemy champs and the dragon as a pet is cool and fun.
Mordekaiser seems great. Yeah, he's available for 1350 BE (IP). But I find Tanks too difficult to play with.
If you like jungling, amumu is cheap and fairly straight forward. As a tank, he can take a lot of punishment, but deals a lot of magic damage for a tank as well as provides good catch potential.

Yup, Mordekaiser is the epitome of “absorb and deal damage” because that’s literally all he does.  However, his target access (and retention) is incredibly low.  While he does work as a mid laner, if you want a champion for the mid lane who soaks damage while still being a threat, Cho’Gath and Galio are more reliable picks.
Yeah, Mordekaiser and Galio seems good. But I find Tanks too difficult to play with.

Hi, it seems you just started. Talon is an assassin, champion that excels in killing squishy champions quickly. His low survivality is a tradeoff for this.

Imo Talon is very good champion right now, but consider this: take ignite instead of heal, and make custom runepage with Domination primary (Electrocute, Sudden Impact, Eyeball Collection, Relentless Hunter and Sorcery second: Celerity, Nimbus Cloak other good runes from sorcery are Waterwalking and Manaflow Band (if you have mana issues in lane)).

Your role is to kill enemy marksman or support or mage. You should not stay visible to enemy team even when both teams group. You should stay behind wall/trees or hidden in bush untill fight starts and enemies uses some of their abilities and spells, ie. you go in when they start focusing others, do your job and then you try to apply additional damage to whoever still stands without dying if possible,

Thanks for this suggestion. Very helpful.

I usually do good in Intermediate Coop vs AI games. But in Normal Blind Pick, I screw up badly. Fiora and Riven best suit my gameplay style, but I don't have them in my collection.
